text: Brother Matthew Luke is a new age reggae artist from Dominica. His albums include Here Comes The Dub Poet, My Tribe and Live in Concert. He has been called on frequently as a speaker, performer and artisan to represent Dominica in cultural festivals and reggae concerts around the world. He has been compared to Bob Marley for his chanting reggae style. ==External links== *Matthew Luke : Folk, New Age, Reggae-Ska, World Beat Category:Reggae musicians Category:Dominica musicians Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Brother Matthew Luke
